blogPost.title: If any Ubuntu maintainers are listening: PLEASE STOP DOING THIS
blogPost.author: zdw

localize.title: 如果有Ubuntu的维护者在听，请不要再这样做了。请停止这样做

previous.excerpt:
It baffles me how the brilliant Thomas Peterffy goes on CNBC and explains
exactly what happen to the market during the Game Stop roller coaster last
month, yet CNBC remains clueless. It was painful to see the journalists barely
understanding anything that came out of this guy’s mouth.

I highly…
previous.title: Interactive Brokers’ chairman Peterffy: “I would like to point out that we have come dangerously close to the collapse of the entire system”

localize.title: 互动经纪公司董事长彼得菲："我想指出，我们已经危险地接近整个系统的崩溃"
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我很困惑，为什么聪明的托马斯-彼得菲会在CNBC上解释说
在上一次的Game Stop过山车期间，市场到底发生了什么？
月，但CNBC仍然毫无头绪。令人痛心的是，记者们几乎没有看到
理解任何东西，走出这个家伙的嘴。

我高度...
